overall.comments: You got through a tough packet! It looks like you rewrote your UP but solved the original one...

challenges.comments: Well-thought out challenges. Make sure the logic follows from beginning to end of each challenge

packet.text: In the year 2038, in Chicago, there may be a problem with the wealthy having more options for Cloud usage. For example, the wealthy can spend more for higher tiers of security, faster access , and more choices. This could be a problem because the wealthy would be the only people in the world who have secured personal information.

In the year 2038, in Chicago, there may be a problem with major Cloud Storage companies taking short cuts. For example, the companies will take shortcuts due to the want to please all their customers. This could be a problem because people will be unsafe if short cuts are being taken.

In the year 2038, in Chicago, there may be a problem with technical advancements being too far ahead of the law. For example, if somebody hacks a cloud, the law does not have the technical ability to stop and punish the hacker. This could be a problem because hackers won't be able to be stopped.

In the year 2038, in Chicago, there may be a problem with money outweighing artificial intelligence. For example, businesses are more worried about the money they make rather than their consumers' safety. This could be a problem because machine learning can further benefit consumers more than we can.

In the year 2038, in Chicago, there may be a problem with lack of physical human interaction. For example, MK can virtually be in any room until hackers take over. This may be a problem because if a hacker gets into the system, global communications will be destroyed.

In the year 2038, in Chicago, there may be a problem with the clouds against each other instead of protecting their consumers personal information. For example, 80 million profiles have been breached. This may be a problem because the companies are more focused on their reputation rather than their customer's safety.

In the year 2038, in Chicago, there may be a problem with people's health. For example, if the people of the world are not doing basic activities to be active, then their health will be in danger. This could be a problem because everyone will be online through virtual experience, and not doing simple tasks to stay healthy.

In the year 2038, in Chicago, there may be a problem with the basic jobs being replaced with virtual technology. For example, because everyone is having experiences virtually, the experiences are rapidly replacing jobs. This could be a problem because people will base their life of the virtual technology rather than basing their life off of people.

In the year 2038, in Chicago, there may be a problem with the government and other agencies being enclosed to debt due to repaying the hacked victims. For example, the government agencies will have to repay and make up for the money that got hacked for over 80 million people. This could be a problem because the government needing to refund 80 million people will lead to debt.

In the year 2038, in Chicago, there may be a problem with the cloud companies taking the responsibility of the government. For example, 80 million people were hacked and the cloud companies were working harder than the government to find a solution. This could be a problem because the country's citizens will not be protected by the country's government.

In the year 2038, in Chicago, there may be a problem with lack of physical defense. For example, people now do so much virtually that they don't even interact with 100 other people right next to them. This may be a problem because if a group of people tried to take over a country, the inhabitants would be unprepared and easily defeated.

In the year 2038, in Chicago, there may be a problem with Cloud companies using consumers' data for other purposes. For example, the consumers send their data of the servers where cloud companies "protect" it. This may be a problem because if government secrets are in the cloud, these companies could reveal them.

In the year 2038, in Chicago, there may be a problem with the environment and the world being overlooked by virtual technology. For example, people's focus will be on this technology, not other major important things. This could be a problem because there may not be even any concern about the environment and the world.

In the year 2038, in Chicago, there may be a problem with relying on personal information being stored on one and only cloud. For example, if someone hacks this information, you are in a lot of danger due to one single cloud being hacked. This could be a problem because once hackers have valuable information, you cannot stop them easily from hacking more.

In the year 2038, in Chicago, there may be a problem with there be no backup plan if and when the cloud collapses. For example, after the cloud becomes hacked, people will not be able to provide basic necessities for themselves. This could be a problem because due to the lack of preparedness, millions of people will be at stake.

In the year 2038, in Chicago, there may be a problem with the companies creating unsecured clouds. For example, in a cloud there are many weaknesses in a cloud, so that makes it easy for hackers to have access to personal data. This could be a problem because the weak cloud structure will lead to a large breach in many peoples' personal clouds.

UP.comments: This is great - specific, relevant, and original

packet.text: In the year 2038, in Chicago, cloud companies are growing quickly, using shortcuts to compete with their rivals, and aren't using technology to its full potential. In what ways might we increase the level of integrity shown by these companies so that consumers' information remains as secure as possible?

stem-and-kvp.kvp-text: increase the level of integrity of these companies

purpose.text: consumers info remains as secure as possible

solutions.comments: Your solutions "increase security of the cloud" well, but didn't address your KVP very well. What a bummer!

packet.text: Cloud Companies will make a program where consumers information is divided into millions of devices. They will do this because it will make it more  difficult for the hackers to access the personal information. The Cloud Companies will do this by taking the consumers most important information, and dividing it among thousands of digital devices.

NASA and other space agencies will create a system of satellites with quantum computers or quantum data storage chips which store information on an atomic scale. They will do this by creating the Quantum Storing and Secure Satellite System or Q4S.

data.comments: How does this tie to company integrity

packet.text: The government will work with cloud companies to raise the penalty for hacking, and make the cloud more secure. They will do this because the hackers will not want to hack the cloud if the penalty is high. They will do this by changing the law to make the consequences worse for personal information hacking.

The United Cloud Computing Service (U.C.C.S) will unite Cloud storage and computing to secure all cloud private information. They will do this because with a variety of cloud companies, it is easier to keep information from hackers.

The current AI will work with cloud companies will develop programs that will learn how to unscramble tracking information to locate hackers. They will do this because it will prove the can and will do more to protect consumers' data in the future.

MK and her cloud-based team will work with cloud companies to improve communications among cloud and AI companies. They will do this because it will allow faster alert and recovery of data in the case of a hack.

The government will become more involved with the Cloud companies to ensure safety of the consumers' personal information. They will do this because it will make the cloud companies more stable and more trustworthy.

All Cloud companies will lower the cost of Cloud storage to ensure economic trust and have the necessity of having affordable cloud storage. They will do this because it will allow more people to store data on the Cloud, and also allow Cloud companies to have more customers, which will still result in profit.

The National Security Awareness Society (N.S.A.S.) will put up advertisements all around major cities to raise awareness to get private Clouds for all personal information, and to create passwords with many characters and take advantage of retina scans for passwords. They will do this because it will help raise awareness for Cloud safety.

The government will make a law for Cloud companies that security and safety have to be their #1 priority. They will do this by occasionally checking up on the Cloud storage companies to ensure that money is not the biggest priority.

The International Event Society (I.E.S.) will make more attractions in major cities to encourage people to get of virtual devices and go outside. They will do this because it will encourage more people to enjoy the outdoors and only use Clouds for personal information.

data.comments: Unclear how this relates to UP

packet.text: The International Space Station will use satellites to store Cloud data for all loud companies. They will do this because it will help big Cloud companies come and work together to ensure Cloud safety. They will do this by using 1 satellite to store only personal information of Cloud companies, and the one satellite will be used for all Cloud companies.

The Cloud companies will work with the government to ensure the cost of Cloud storage is the same for both classes. They will do this because it will ensure the wealthy and the lower class will have the same access to quality Cloud storage.

The World Classification Cloud will have [not sure] hologram FaceTime with the people around the world and teach them about what they can do to protect themselves from having their personal information hacked. They will do this because it will cause more awareness with the hacking problem around the world.

The government will create a law that all personal information has to be stored on a private Cloud. They will do this because it will ensure stronger safety of the citizens of the world because of the strength and security of the private cloud is more beneficial to prevent hackers.

The Personal Information Security Group (P.I.S.G.) will overlook the internet to ensure no personal information is being added from the Cloud. They will do this because it will prevent hackers from adding personal information to the internet. And they will delete any private information as soon as they review it on the internet.
Which solution uses technology to its fullest potential?
Which solution protects consumers' information the best?
Which solution is the most economical?
Which solution is the most humane?
Which solution decreases the number of hackers most efficiently?

Nasa will unite Cloud companies to create another space program to secure the Cloud and information of consumers. This program is a satellite system which will store data across 100 satellites with Quantum Computing/Storing devices. These devices communicate with each other very similarly to the Cloud to store store information.
 Quantum Computers were first developed around 2020 by the company D-wave. Instead of normal transistors, a quantum computer uses atoms and "mixed" polarities for bits. Quantum computers use bits called qubits with infinite positions called superpositions. The difficulty with Quantum Computers was their bits would change value when measured. This phenomenon was mastered with other Quantum Physics phenomenon in 2032 which has made it possible to use there machines.
 This satellite system will be called the Quantum Storing and Secure Satellite System or the Q4S. The reason that these computers are faster is that qubits compute exponentially faster than normal computers, thus making them faster, more secure, and smaller. Because the Q4S does have Quantum computers and those computers work almost at absolute zero degrees, they are a satellite system instead of a data warehouse on Earth.
 People who support the Q4S are consumers and non-Cloud companies who keep information on the Cloud. Other Cloud companies want to stay separate of the Q4S. We can solve this by updating their systems with more expensive quantum computers with cooling systems that can be on earth.
 The Q4S is a lot better way of storing consumers information because it is faster, smaller, and more secure than normal computers. The Q4S will keep the Cloud the best way of storing information and work.

AP.comments: This is a well written AP to a problem you didn't present
